member.name: T:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Documents.Configuration.ITextExtractorSettings
member.summary: Defines the contract for the settings used to construct a text extractor.

member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Documents.Configuration.ITextExtractorSettings.MimeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the MIME type associated with these settings. This property is mandatory.

member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Documents.Configuration.ITextExtractorSettings.ExtractorType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the extractor. This property is mandatory.

member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Documents.Configuration.ITextExtractorSettings.Parameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameters used to construct the extractor.
member.value: The parameters used to construct the extractor.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Documents.IDocumentService.ExtractText(System.String,System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream)
member.param: The MIME type of the document.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Documents.IDocumentService.GetSupportedExtensions
member.summary: Gets all the supported extensions for documents.

member.name: T:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Documents.ITextExtractor
member.summary: Defines functionality for extracting text content from a raw file.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Documents.ITextExtractor.Initialize(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Initializes the instance of the text extractor.

member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Documents.ITextExtractor.MimeType
member.summary: Gets the MIME type that this instance supports.

member.name: M:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Documents.ITextExtractor.GetText(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Extracts text content from a raw document.
